results.title: Simvastatin inhibits neutrophil degranulation induced by anti-neutrophil cytoplasm auto-antibodies and N-formyl-methionine-leucine-phenylalanine (fMLP) peptide.
results.text_hl: We further demonstrated that serum from @SPECIES_10116 @@@rats@@@ that received @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@ significantly inhibited neutrophil degranulation induced by @<m>DISEASE_Anti_Neutrophil_Cytoplasmic_Antibody_Associated_Vasculitis</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D056648 @@@ANCA@@@ (31.7%, p=0.01) and fMLP (23.5%, p=0.03) compared to serum from control animals.

citations.NLM: Al-Ani B. Simvastatin inhibits neutrophil degranulation induced by anti-neutrophil cytoplasm auto-antibodies and N-formyl-methionine-leucine-phenylalanine (fMLP) peptide. Saudi Med J. 2013 May;34(5):477-83. PMID: 23677263
